short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To keep track of how much time employee is spending on work & non-work related sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time spent on each website (in terms of minutes or hh-mm-ss format) & percentage wise split is shown

Last Time Reset & 'Allow in Incognito' toggle data is shown in local timeformat

'Allow In Incognito' toggle showcases if the addon is tracking incognito mode or not

'Clear All' is associated with auto-csv file download to host machine so that a backup remains even in the worst scenario of accidental data deletion

60 secs of inactivity before the tracker goes into IDLE MODE!!
